text: Marion Hänsel (12 February 1949 - 8 June 2020) was a French-born Belgian movie director, producer, actress and screenwriter. Her best known movie was Between the Devil and the Deep Blue Sea. It was entered into the 1995 Cannes Film Festival. Hänsel died on 8 June 2020, aged 71.La cinéaste belge Marion Hänsel est décédée ==Movies== * Palaver (1969) * Le Lit (1982) * Dust (1985) * The Cruel Embrace (1987) * Il Maestro (1990) * Between Heaven and Earth (1992) * Between the Devil and the Deep Blue Sea (1995) * Hell (2005) * Sounds of Sand (2006) * Noir océan (2010) * La Tendresse (2013) * En amont du fleuve (2016) ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Belgian movie directors Category:Belgian movie producers Category:Belgian movie actors Category:Belgian screenwriters Category:French movie directors Category:French movie producers Category:French movie actors
title: Marion Hänsel
